{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/title|is_specialized}}
{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/navbar}}

|dcl1=

{{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::is_specialized}} 的值对所有存在 {{lc|std::numeric_limits}} 特化的 {{tt|T}} 是 {{c|true}}。

===标准特化===

{{dsc hitem | {{tt|T}} | {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::is_specialized}} 的值}}
{{dsc | {{c/core|/* 未特化 */}} | {{c|false}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|bool}}           | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|char}}           | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|signed char}}    | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|unsigned char}}  | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|wchar_t}}        | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|char8_t}} {{mark since c++20}} | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|char16_t}} {{mark since c++11}}| {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|char32_t}} {{mark since c++11}}| {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|short}}                 | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|unsigned short}} | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|int}}            | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|unsigned int}}   | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|long}}           | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|unsigned long}}  | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|long long}} {{mark since c++11}}         | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|unsigned long long}} {{mark since c++11}}| {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|float}}          | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|double}}         | {{c|true}} }}
{{dsc | {{c/core|long double}}    | {{c|true}} }}

===示例===
{{example
|
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;limits&gt;
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

int main()
{
    enum E{};

    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha
              &lt;&lt; std::numeric_limits&lt;bool&gt;::is_specialized &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; std::numeric_limits&lt;long long&gt;::is_specialized &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; std::numeric_limits&lt;std::true_type&gt;::is_specialized &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; std::numeric_limits&lt;E&gt;::is_specialized &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
true
true
false
false
}}
